website_summaries.verdict: For any lady looking for a stylish pair of bowling shoes, these are both functional and fashionable.
pros: These bowling shoes are lightweight, comfortable, and can be easily broken in with just one wear
Designed to look like traditional bowling shoes with a fun and feminine flair
Bold use of black and hot pink
Dark color doesn’t show dirt or wear
cons: These shoes run large, so size down if between sizes

customer_reviews.title: So frustrated. Sizing all wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size small because of other reviews. So I got a 9.5. Guess what, they're a half size too small. So I order a 10. And hmmm... they literally feel the same. So I hold them up with the 9.5s, and me and my family all conclude they're the same effing size. Am I really going to have to send them back and order a third pair??? Will a 10.5 be a size 9.5 as well? Or will it be a 10, 10.5, or 11?? Who knows?!
customer_reviews.author: E_Royall

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: If you are unfamiliar with bowling shoe sizing, you usually are about a half size under your normal shoe size. However, after reading the reviews on theses shoes, I ordered a whole size smaller than my usual 7.5. I ordered a 6.5. They were a little snug when I first put them on, but after one use, they fit great. Theses are super cute and were a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for a beginner bowler...go small though
customer_reviews.text: I recently started a office bowling group with some of my co workers so I decided to purchase my own shoes and these are a huge hit. Super cute, comfortable and as far as bowling shoes they do the trick. I bowl about once a week or every other week so they are just right price wise for me. I will recommend going down a full size, I went down half a size and there's a little bit of room, I thought about sending them back for the next size down but I figured they would be fine. Definitely perfect for the novice bowler.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I ordered was a size 10, because I read in reviews that sizes ran large. But these were way small, so I exchanged them for an 11 and those fit perfect. I love these shoes. I go bowling once in a blue moon with friends, but it's nice to have my own pair of shoes and not have to wear the ones that they rent out to everyone else. These feel great and give you just the right amount of slide on the lanes.
customer_reviews.author: Am Azon Woman

customer_reviews.title: Noisy!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes claim to be made of "sport leather" but are made of Naugahyde or something similarly awful. They are both stiff and super loud with creaks and squeaks (I sent them back as defective due to the noise). They additionally have no arch support and the sole is the same material that cheap flip-flops (they kind they sell at the dollar store) are made from. Seriously, if you were to try these on at a store you would maybe expect to pay $10 and that's if you were desperate for bowling shoes. You would be better off renting unless you don't mind everybody thinking that you're busting a huge fart every time you take a step.
customer_reviews.author: Meowmix001

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I am only an occasional bowler but needed a new pair of shoes. These seem to fit the bill as they weren't very expensive and came in a wide width and looked kind of cute. The reviews were helpful too. They are comfortable, but a bit on the stiff side, but that is helpful because I need as much support as I can get with my flat feet. I can't answer about how they slide or don't slide, but they work well for my needs and they are a nice shoe.
customer_reviews.author: M. Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: I then bought a second pair in a whole size smaller and they fit great. They make my feet look small
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in my size, wore them, then decided they are WAY TOO BIG! I then bought a second pair in a whole size smaller and they fit great. They make my feet look small, even though they now fit fantastically. They have the bottom that works well for sliding in bowling. That bottom surface is on both the left and the right shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Girlie Girl

customer_reviews.title: I have a bad aversion to the idea of using communal bowling shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: I put these babies on and bowled a strike my first throw! I have a bad aversion to the idea of using communal bowling shoes and so finally bit the bullet and bought my own. I did a fair amount of research first and decided on these. The price was great (they pay for themselves if I use them about 12 times) and they're obviously way more adorable than communal shoes. I got compliments on them too! They work, in my opinion, better than the used and possibly fungus ridden shoes at the bowling alley. I typically wear a 7 1/2 but due to previous reviews ordered a 7 and they were soooo right. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: emilyisbuttercream

customer_reviews.title: bought a size smaller than my normal shoe and they fit great. I don't like to slide when u bowl ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, bought a size smaller than my normal shoe and they fit great. I don't like to slide when u bowl so these are great.
customer_reviews.author: eearnest

customer_reviews.title: I love these. My real size should be 10.5
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo cute! I love these. My real size should be a 10.5, but most shoes don't come in this size, so I end up getting a 10 (slightly too small) or 11 (slightly too big). After reading these reviews went down to a 9.5 and they the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: EastEndGirl

customer_reviews.title: Read all of the reviews...
customer_reviews.text: I should’ve listened to other reviewers. The shoes were a half size too big. The bottoms were soft and white. I was nervous that they’d look bad after using them just a few times because they’d surely get dirty after rubbing on the floor a few times. I reread reviews and saw people complaining about the quality of the bottoms, so I passed on getting the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Castelino

customer_reviews.title: Its a bowling shoe and it’s not a rental
customer_reviews.text: Happy with purchase. Not a professional bowler so not wearing these more that once a week. These are stylish vs the beige rental ones at the bowling lanes and haven’t been worn by thousands of people. Just as comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: L’escargot

customer_reviews.title: Bowling Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These were excellent shoes and very affordable!! Please note the shoes run big. I wear a 7.5 regularly but the 6.5 fits.
customer_reviews.author: EES5678

customer_reviews.title: The 8 fit like a 9
customer_reviews.text: Cute clown shoes. One was scraped on the heel and had a small hole inside in the heel area, so I returned them I believe they were returns. The 8 fit like a 9. They are not real leather and they look cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Burny

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes, but didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: My kids ordered these bowling shoes for me as a gift, so sweet! BUT...they did not fit my foot well. I have never ordered shoes on line, so its nothing to speak poorly of the product, its just they didn't fit. I didn't order another pair, thought i would look locally for bowling shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Beware of color!
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8 1/2 to a 9 in regular shoes and bowling shoes. I bought this as a replacement for my old bowling shoes. The color is not true to this picture. In the picture it looks hot pink, it is definitely NOT! It is a flamingo pink, good thing I have the perfect bag to use that matches. The size was off I think. I ordered a 9, better large than small, BUT it is huge. I think I could have ordered an 8. I have wide feet and it still was large.
customer_reviews.author: Joslin Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I use size 10 in women's shoes. These in my experience do run a size larger. I tried them on with a sock on the thicker side & they fit good. Then I decided to purchase memory foam insoles since the inside felt like plastic. Now with the inserts in place & my regular thin socks the fit is PERFECTION.
customer_reviews.author: L!kaL!ka

customer_reviews.title: ... also very light weight not sure if thats a good thing or not but feel like the bottoms might ...
customer_reviews.text: Well i dont know much about bowling shoes cause im a beginner however they are a half a side to big at least even though i ordered my size they are also very light weight not sure if thats a good thing or not but feel like the bottoms might wear out fast but i hope not! I love the color of them and cant wait to try them out just foing to tie them tight and hope they dont slid around on my feet.. my recommendation is to go down a half a size if you wear a nine and a half get a nine and u should be good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I joined a bowling league with my mom for fun, and needed shoes because the bowling alley we were at was very old and the shoes were awful. I also am not a big bowler and didn’t want to spend anything crazy. The shoes do run a little big but I looked at reviews and ordered a size smaller and that are great! Fit well, I never had to break them in they were very comfortable from the beginning. Great, and affordable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are very comfortable and I am so glad I read the reviews ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable and I am so glad I read the reviews before buying. I am a solid size 8 in shoes. After reading the reviews about them running big I ordered a size 7.5. I am so glad I did. They fit perfectly. I don't bowl a lot so the price was great. Looks like a nice quality shoe. I am very pleased with my order.
customer_reviews.author: love to shop

customer_reviews.title: Shoe don't slide on bowling lanes.
customer_reviews.text: I am a bowler and the material on the bottom of the shoe does not slide well on bowling alleys. I called the telephone number on their website and they suggested Slide which is a powder that makes the bottom of your shoe slide good. I had already tired that and it still didn't slide. The company also suggested I get one of those slide socks for my left foot. So I have ordered one of them from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Snug at first
customer_reviews.text: These were quite snug at first. I have to wear with very thin socks. But otherwise, these bowling shoes are just what they need to be. Bonus - they match my Pink & Black ball!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: Women's Bowling Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 8.5 and they feel like they are one size too big. I thought perhaps they were 8.5 Wide, but the shoes are marked as 8.5 only.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes and value
customer_reviews.text: My wife is happy with these bowling shoes. They look great. They run a little big (a lot of space in the toe box) but not a problem. She bowled good in them and they're comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Horrible bowling shoe. Cheap material. No bend. I would rather wear the bowling alley shoes that you have to pay for.
customer_reviews.author: abol22

customer_reviews.title: Size does matter!
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I read the review's and went with a size smaller! When ever I rent shoes I always have to go with a size smaller because the bowling alley has "uni-sex" shoes. Some shoes I wear a 7.5, some a 7, this I ordered in a size 6 and they are STILL a little too big! However, they are wearable. The pink was not a "hot pink" like I expected either. It's a little darker than a "pepto-pink".
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Great value, quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: This is a way late review, and my bad for that. The fiancé loved them! Fit was perfect and comfortable! They worked great ! Thankyou!
customer_reviews.author: rogue warrior

customer_reviews.title: Did I miss the fine print about these being for a clown costume?  These run LARGE
customer_reviews.text: These shoes seem to run WAY big. My wife got them but had to return them as they seemed to be at least a full size larger than they were marked. Seemed like a good shoe but was ridiculously over sized when she tried them on.
customer_reviews.author: Dave H.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are bright and fun for bowling. They arrived with one lace almost completely severed. I sent a picture to the seller and I had a new lace within 2-3 days. I am a size 8 and these were a little loose, I wear thick socks when I bowl so it isn't a big deal, but if you are trying to decide between 2 sizes you may want to go for the smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Sharo

customer_reviews.title: Shoes arrived and look like they have been worn
customer_reviews.text: Shoes arrived and look like they have been worn. There are scuff marks and a puncture hole on one shoe. The insoles and felt on bottom of shoes are not properly glued. I also didn't receive my item invoice. The invoice I received belongs to another person with a different size shoe. This is the first bad review that I have written and I take reviewing items seriously, with that said...buyers beware.
customer_reviews.author: SJO522

customer_reviews.title: I almost didn't and I am glad I did
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE!!! Listen to what they say about a SHOE SIZE SMALLER. I almost didn't and I am glad I did. I wear between a 9.5 and a 10. I bought a 8.5 and it fits GREAT. I just love how they look. I then had to order a bag and of course shirts to match! LOL
customer_reviews.author: paula boone

customer_reviews.title: Work well, simple bowling shoes
customer_reviews.text: These serve their purpose and are nice simple bowling shoes. I used them for a league and never had an issue with slipping or anything. I will say they seem to be made a little more cheaply than other bowling shoes (seem more plasticy than leathery) but I personally don't care about this since I bowled for fun and not competitively. They were a little snug on me but this was better than them being too big. I have bowled with them for two years now and they are still holding up and working well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie J Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great bowling shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love my bowling shoes! They do run a bit big. I normally wear 7.5/8. I ordered a 7 in these and they fit very well in length. They are loose in width and I have to wear thicker socks or tie them tightly. I’ve been using them for more than a month now and really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Sadler

customer_reviews.title: cute, but feel a little bit cheap
customer_reviews.text: Very cute bowling shoes. They're sort of stiff and don't feel as well made as some others, and maybe not as cushy, but you only wear them once in a while for a few hours at the most anyway, right? So who cares. It's not that they're uncomfortable. And they'll last for what I need them for. Much better than icky ol' rental shoes and way cuter! If you're a serious bowler, you probably want more serious shoes anyway. But if you want a little bit of style, these are the ones :-)
customer_reviews.author: J-Dub

customer_reviews.title: nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these bowling shoes because I liked the look and the price. They are true to size. I originally ordered one size smaller as suggested, but had to return those because they were too small and ordered my actual size. Received the replacement and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Run large, and not hot pink as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Runs very large. I usually wear a 6.5 - 7, and so I ordered a 6.5 after reading they run large. They're still a good full size too big. The sole is definitely not great quality. It's just a later of foam, with plain rubber for the heel and felt cloth glued on the toe. And the pink is more of a peachy pale pink, not hot pink like in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Lack of proper shipping materials
customer_reviews.text: I’m shocked to have received my purchased shipped in only its shoe box, with one tiny 1” piece of scotch tape holding the box closed. Seller/Amazon you’re loosing your touch!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia E Deidun

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe/fits well
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for and the price was definitely right.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Feeling frustrated!!! Quality control is lacking!
customer_reviews.text: These have clearly been worn before. Horrible feeling when you think you are buying brand new item. So frustrating!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Swank

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality shoe...however make sure you order at least 1 full size down. I only knew this after reading the reviews, which were spot on that these shoes run big! Overall I am extremely pleased with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Stone

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: I have a small foot so I don't usually order shoes on line but I would not hesitate to order shoes again
customer_reviews.author: Jeanna Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great bowling shoes that still look new!
customer_reviews.text: Beauitful and comfortable bowling shoes. Really happy they fit perfectly when they came. I never am lucky with ordering clothing items on line but my area had few choices of bowling shoes so I turned to AMAZON! YEAH AMAZON...you have it all!! The best part...this color does NOT show dirt! My old white ones never stayed clean looking.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stern

customer_reviews.title: Strike 5 times in order after first time wearing it
customer_reviews.text: I suck at bowling but First time I wear this shoe I striked 5 times in order. lol sound funny it surprised my and my husband a lot. best shoe ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Starter shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a non competitive bowling league we joined. Great starter shoe. Very light weight and somewhat cheaply made but definitely good enough for our weekly bowling. Was unsure based on reviews whether to order a half size or full size smaller. I typically wear an 8.5 and ordered a 7.5, they fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Not a pro bowler but I looked like one. Great shoes great product
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable bowling shoes
customer_reviews.text: Recieved my bowling shoes today and just love them. They are comfortable and the fit is great. Now I cant wait to use them
customer_reviews.author: oneheroswife

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife really enjoyed these, and they look great on her.
customer_reviews.author: KiryuDojima

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for the price
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit perfectly and are a great buy. I only bowl about twice a month, but paying to rent shoes adds up quickly. I am glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: Rebab

customer_reviews.title: Ok for ocassional use. Cheap quality.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap material. I seldom bowl, but on occasion I need them. They’re just barely ok for ocassional use for a couple hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoes! Great for Wide Feet.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are GREAT! I have a really wide foot and can never find shoes that fit and these are perfect. If you have narrow or regular width feet, I would recommend a size or half size smaller as they do run big. I wear a 6.5 wide or a 7.5 regular and I ordered a 7 and they are a little big. With a thick pair of socks they are perfect but just beware that they do run wide.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie V.

customer_reviews.title: I love it but I think I ordered a half size ...
customer_reviews.text: It's cute, I love it but I think I ordered a half size larger. I normally wear a 5.5 but this 5.5 is a tad too big. But when I wear thicker socks, they fit better.
customer_reviews.author: Rowena Similar

customer_reviews.title: I like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes. Size was perfect. Quality is okay. Glad that I have them for when I go bowling.
customer_reviews.author: Deatra Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and nice outside material but the sole portion is made of ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and nice outside material but the sole portion is made of foam like material... Found that very odd.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy G.

customer_reviews.title: Color is deceiving
customer_reviews.text: The fit is good. My reason for 3 stars is the color is shown as a bright pink but what I received was a dull dirty pink.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love them! A little wide on the toe area
customer_reviews.text: I wish that they came in a size 5, but the 5 1/2 fit okay when I wear fuzzy socks.. Anyway, I absolutely love them! A little wide on the toe area, but not enough to make a difference
customer_reviews.author: Abbey Thomas

customer_reviews.title: runs small
customer_reviews.text: smaller than other BSI bowling shoes. I ordered a size 5 in style 532, white shoe with blue logo. It was 1.5 sizes too big for my child. I ordered a 5.5 in the pink/black shoe and it is barely fitting. Maybe a half size too big. Thankful for Prime shipping on these. Love the color and style.
customer_reviews.author: Richerson

customer_reviews.title: Great bowling shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I really love how these bowling shoes look and feel. They are so cute. I actually think my game has improved rather than wearing those rental shoes. Also loved the no shipping cost and no sales tax. Also they were to arrive in 3-10 days and they came in three. They are light and comfortable and the same size I wear in regular shoes fit me in these bowling shoes. The compliments I receive are many!
customer_reviews.author: Skipper7799

customer_reviews.title: Exact fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit comfortable you don't slip in these great value I even bought a pair for my friend
customer_reviews.author: Meemee Rewis

customer_reviews.title: These fit great I did size down I am typically a 9
customer_reviews.text: These fit great I did size down I am typically a 9.5 - 10 I ordered a 9. they look great and seem like good quality... I do not bowl often but would rather not wear the alley's shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jeslynn2

customer_reviews.title: Size way down when ordering!
customer_reviews.text: For me, the shoes were way too big. I wear a size 6 usually and ordered a 5.5. They fit like a size 7. Additionally, the upper leather hurt the top of my foot, even with the shoe not fitting snugly. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: A. L. Higginbotham

customer_reviews.title: My wife got these and loves them. It seems ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife got these and loves them. It seems there's a split on how they fit, she found that the fit is true to the regular shoe size. For bowling purposes, she loves it and it slides well.
customer_reviews.author: Gambit and Jean Grey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes but they run large. Returned them for a size smaller and all is well!
customer_reviews.author: CQ

customer_reviews.title: Too big; not true to size at all.
customer_reviews.text: I have worn a size 9 for my entire adult life and these shoes were way too big. I returned them and ordered an 8.5, but they were way too big as well. I thought about trying a 3rd time for an 8.0, but it's too much hassle. Disappointed as they are really cute. My friend ordered the blue ones but gave them away to someone else as they were way too big for her.
customer_reviews.author: moondance

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes but too big
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 10 but after reading the reviews, I decided to order a 9 1/2. Apparently I should have gone smaller, a 9 or even an 8 1/2 because these shoes are still way too big. The quality of these shoes are in line with the price. I expect they'll last a year or so, but then again, I'm only wearing them twice a week.
customer_reviews.author: Othercat

customer_reviews.title: These shoes fit like regular bowling shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit like regular bowling shoes, about 1/2 size smaller than my regular street shoes. They're very cute, and the pink is more like a bubblegum bright pink versus the fuschia color on my screen, and I'm very pleased with the color. Comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but they do run big my sneaker size is ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but they do run big my sneaker size is usually a seven and I bought these in at seven and they're big on me
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have awesome slide, which is surprisingly important in improving your bowling average. I have also saved so much money by not having to rent shoes every time we go to bowl. They do run a little big, however. I ordered a size 6, I normally wear a size 7, and still should have chosen another half or whole size down, but I still make them work.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Win at life with these stylish bowling shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of wasting $3 to rent bowling shoes every time I take my kids bowling! I figured these will easily pay for themselves in just a few months, and I can still bowl a miserly 67 and feel like a winner in these hot pink, comfortable (true to size) shoes.
customer_reviews.author: seekerofgrace

customer_reviews.title: Did not fit
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited when buying these shoes. I followed the directions when ordering the shoes. Sadly enough when I tried them on they were too small. I would really like an exchange. Can someone from this company please contact me.
customer_reviews.author: brianna

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. A little big for me even though ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. A little big for me even though I bought my normal shoe size, so makes them feel a bit stiff... but since I'm only wearing them for short periods of time, definitely worth it. Much better than paying for rentals all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Emily R

customer_reviews.title: Worst Bowling Shoes I've Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: Cheap - the pad at the bottom of the shoe to help it slide was thin, it was hard to start getting it to slide - then after i started to slide...the pad detached from the shoe...going to have to buy new bowling shoes....after 2 months..
customer_reviews.author: Stella Driscoll

customer_reviews.title: Look and fit well
customer_reviews.text: I generally wear a women's size 11/12, depending on the type of shoe. I took a chance on these, since most of the reviews said they ran slightly large. They fit great, slightly wider than I need. My fav color combo, and they match my bowling bag!
customer_reviews.author: Retired Librarian

customer_reviews.title: As advertised except they are very hard or stiff. ...
customer_reviews.text: As advertised except they are very hard or stiff. Not as soft as other bowling shoes that I have ordered. These shoes run a bit large for my size.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: run big but GREAT SHOE!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. I have worn them about 30 times so far with No issues. That do run a bit big, I was glad a read reviews. Buy these based on the size you wear at the alley. A size smaller than your daily shoe size. They are comfortable and stylish. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse

customer_reviews.title: The size is off by an inch all m y ...
customer_reviews.text: The size is off by an inch all m y wife's shoes are 6.5 and I had to return twine to go down a whole shoe size 5.5
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Padilla Jr

customer_reviews.title: my left shoe when wearing it makes me feel like my sock is twisted when its not but otherwise ...
customer_reviews.text: no issues really with this product, my left shoe when wearing it makes me feel like my sock is twisted when its not but otherwise loving my new bowling shoes
customer_reviews.author: Daniele

customer_reviews.title: I like the look and it's comfortable and I ordered a ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and it's comfortable and I ordered a half size smaller than my true shoe size. I plan on bowling once a week. Fingers crossed that they wear good while bowling too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love. Ordered true to size
customer_reviews.text: love. Ordered true to size. Not to big. Not to tight. Could wear any thickness sock
customer_reviews.author: MEIZRDRN

customer_reviews.title: Watch the sizing!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is as expected for bowling shoes, but the sizing is really off. I ordered my normal size and they are really about 2 sizes too big. I'm wearing them with heavy socks and they still slip. I should have exchanged them.
customer_reviews.author: Shop Around Sue

customer_reviews.title: Was very satisfied with my order and it came very quickly
customer_reviews.text: Was very satisfied with my order and it came very quickly, I am greatly appreciated of service thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe but size was a little off.
customer_reviews.text: Product looks good and arrived on time. Only complaint is that the shoe seems to run a 1/2 size bigger than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe; good fit
customer_reviews.text: We actually ordered these for a friend, and she loves them; she's using them for the bowling league she is on; says they are very comfortable, loves the color, and is very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: shadkat

customer_reviews.title: So Cute
customer_reviews.text: these's are great shoes, good colors, nice quality. I've used them once, yes they run big. I wear 11 or 12 depending on the shoe and these give me about a fingers width between my toes and the end of the shoe, they are a bit roomy but over all good shoe, great price and comfy fit!
customer_reviews.author: S McQuirk

customer_reviews.title: Only wore once but liked them very much
customer_reviews.text: Only wore once but liked them very much. I was breaking them in so it was a little irritated by the end of night BUT I bowled 6 games. Looking forward to wearing again. Besides anything better than germy nasty rental shoes! 🙅🏽‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Ridgley

customer_reviews.title: A 7 1/2 fit perfect. Great beginner
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear an 8, however, I had to get a half size down. A 7 1/2 fit perfect. Great beginner shoes
customer_reviews.author: Melissa W

customer_reviews.title: Order your regular size
customer_reviews.text: I ended up sending them back. I read all the reviews and a lot said to order a size smaller because they ran big. So I ordered an 8, a size smaller than my regular size of 9. They were too small. My advice is to order your regular size and go from there. Nice shoes.
customer_reviews.author: windygale

customer_reviews.title: Run large
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They run large and wide. I usually wear a 9.5 but based on reviews bought a 9. They fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: angella eanes

customer_reviews.title: Shoe has a wide width. Too big for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoe has a wide width. Too big for my foot and I wear medium width shoes. No problem with returning to sender for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Great bowling shoe!
customer_reviews.text: well made, great fit and great price vs. buying through my local bowling alley. The heel was a little taller than what I was previously using so it took a little getting used to but overall I am very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: WendyH

customer_reviews.title: The pink part looks cheep more like a vinyl then leather look but the rest is ...
customer_reviews.text: The pink part looks cheep more like a vinyl then leather look but the rest is ok for the price. I guess you get what you pay for, if we were playing more often it would be worth investing in a better quality shoes but for once a month it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: marie s

customer_reviews.title: A bit loose or big
customer_reviews.text: Seams to be holding up good. A bit loose for the size but I like them
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Love these. Ordered 1/2 size smaller
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! I wear an 8 and ordered these in 7 1/2 and they fit great. Took some time to be able to slide, but I expected that. Sliding great within first game.
customer_reviews.author: Lrogoz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice! Great fit...runs big like mentioned...I ordered size down fits great
customer_reviews.author: rachel717

customer_reviews.title: decent, but the bottoms seem cheap
customer_reviews.text: the bottoms were like a foam, and seem really cheap. The shoe itself is cute and stiff
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Red black and 300
customer_reviews.text: Matches my Spider-Man suit, and I bowl perfect 300s now. Okay no not really, the red is lighter than my suit. Good shoes though
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Order a size down
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with these shoes and they are cut large.Go down a size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to size, poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes didn't run big. They are true to size. I wear a 7.5 so ordered a 7 as many reviewers said, and the 7 were too small. Overall quality is poor, matching the price. The suede on the bottom was cut unevenly. Looked like a hack job.
customer_reviews.author: T Sam

customer_reviews.title: these are fine but they do feel a bit
customer_reviews.text: I thought an 8 would be too small because I wear 9 and a half....i got an 8 and a half...these are fine but they do feel a bit big
customer_reviews.author: MIchelle

customer_reviews.title: I have used these for a few weeks and love them. They do seem to run big
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for a few weeks and love them. They do seem to run big, but I just wear thicker socks with them and tighten them down. Next pair I order, I will order 1/2 size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: MotleyHorseLover

customer_reviews.title: Size to big
customer_reviews.text: They run big. Had to return and order a smaller size
customer_reviews.author: Vivian E Burns

product_meta.title: BSI Women's #651 Bowling Shoes
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Women's BSI # 651 shoe is a well made bowling shoe for an affordable price.
feature_bullets: Embossed logo and ORDER A SIZE SMALLER
